mapper.select: select id, table_code, name, value, disabled, width, fixed, parent_id, type, type_type, select_url, align, sortable, filters, show_search, placeholder, sort from table_dynamic where id = #{id}

select id, table_code, name, value, disabled, width, fixed, parent_id, type, type_type, select_url, align, sortable, filters, show_search, placeholder, sort from table_dynamic where table_code = #{tableCode} and id = #{dyId}
mapper.insert: insert into table_dynamic(table_code, name, value, disabled, width, fixed, parent_id, type, type_type, select_url, align, sortable, filters, show_search, placeholder, sort) values (#{tableCode}, #{name}, #{value}, #{disabled}, #{width}, #{fixed}, #{parentId}, #{type}, #{typeType}, #{selectUrl}, #{align}, #{sortable}, #{filters}, #{showSearch}, #{placeholder}, #{sort})

insert into table_dynamic(table_code, name, value, disabled, width, fixed, parent_id, type, type_type, select_url, align, sortable, filters, show_search, placeholder, sort) values
(#{entity.tableCode}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.value}, #{entity.disabled}, #{entity.width}, #{entity.fixed}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.typeType}, #{entity.selectUrl}, #{entity.align}, #{entity.sortable}, #{entity.filters}, #{entity.showSearch}, #{entity.placeholder}, #{entity.sort})

insert into table_dynamic(table_code, name, value, disabled, width, fixed, parent_id, type, type_type, select_url, align, sortable, filters, show_search, placeholder, sort) values
(#{entity.tableCode}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.value}, #{entity.disabled}, #{entity.width}, #{entity.fixed}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.typeType}, #{entity.selectUrl}, #{entity.align}, #{entity.sortable}, #{entity.filters}, #{entity.showSearch}, #{entity.placeholder}, #{entity.sort})
on duplicate key update table_code = values(table_code), name = values(name), value = values(value), disabled = values(disabled), width = values(width), fixed = values(fixed), parent_id = values(parent_id), type = values(type), type_type = values(type_type), select_url = values(select_url), align = values(align), sortable = values(sortable), filters = values(filters), show_search = values(show_search), placeholder = values(placeholder), sort = values(sort)
mapper.update:
update table_dynamic
table_code = #{tableCode},
name = #{name},
value = #{value},
disabled = #{disabled},
width = #{width},
fixed = #{fixed},
parent_id = #{parentId},
type = #{type},
type_type = #{typeType},
select_url = #{selectUrl},
align = #{align},
sortable = #{sortable},
filters = #{filters},
show_search = #{showSearch},
placeholder = #{placeholder},
sort = #{sort},
where id = #{id}
